Configuring Server Pool Policy

To configure the Server Pool Policy, perform the following:

 1. Select the Organization from the drop-down list. By default, root is displayed.

 2. Enter the Number of policies in the textbox and click Add to generate the local disk policy. Table 7-4 lists the elements in the SAN Boot Policy.

Table 7-4 Elements in Server Pool Policy

Item

Description

Name

Lists the name of the Local Disk. This field is editable.

Description

Lists the description of the Local Disk. This field is editable.

Server Pool

Select the server pool of configuration.

Qualifier

Select the qualifier of the configuration.

Organization

Select the desired configuration.

Figure 7-9 Server Pool Policy

 3. Click Save and next to proceed further.
